name: Inqbarna
tagline: We live apps, we love apps!
description: Inqbarna is a Barcelona-based start-up that provides mobile development expertise to its clients. Android, iOS and Windows Phone are their main development platforms, always working with state-of-the-art native mobile technology. Inqbarna has worked with big companies & startups all around the globe: US, Japan, UK, France, Spain...
